column4: Cloud services bolster Microsoft results  shares soar
column5: Microsoft Corp  reported better-than-expected quarterly adjusted revenue for the ninth quarter in a row  boosted by burgeoning demand for its cloud products  sending its shares soaring in after-hours trading on Thursday.

column4: REFILE-UPDATE 4-Cloud services bolster Microsoft results  shares soar
column5: Oct 22 Microsoft Corp reported better-than-expected quarterly adjusted revenue for the ninth quarter in a row  boosted by burgeoning demand for its cloud products  sending its shares soaring in after-hours trading on Thursday.
Microsoft Corp  is cutting about 1 000 jobs in a new round of layoffs  CNBC said in tweet on Thursday.
